EmailTemplate.description: Used for send an automated email to CMS Cork should a HCP email address change.
EmailTemplate.name: HCP Email Address Change
EmailTemplate.subject: HCP Email Address Change : {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
The email address for {!Account.Name} has been changed. Please review the HCP profile in Mercury and determine whether an update is required for related vendor master data.
The HCP profile is as follows: {!Account.Link}
This is an auto-generated email; please do not reply
